name: Trees & Towers
description:
The FACTS:

- Trees & Towers is a tower defense game with unique gameplay dynamics.

- Currently, the game has three different friendly Towers that produce adorable woodland critter soldiers.

- 5 different ghoulish enemies.

- Original orchestral theme song.

- Last minute intensive bug fixes prevented the team from realizing the full vision in time for the GameJam Deadline, so it is with APOLOGIES that we inform you that there's currently only one level to play.

- We're continuing testing and will update with bug fixes, and performance enhancements in a very near future.

- To access the game just download, and extract the .zip file containing the ready-to-play .exe file.

- All gameplay actions are mouse/touchpad point & click controlled.

The FEELS:

- We really hope to be able to update the game soon with all the features we want to show you. Additional levels. Engrossing, but silly, story and lore. Tower special abilities. Enhanced animations and sound effects. Additional musical cues.

- It is important for this Copy Writer to inform you of the awe felt by working with this extremely talented team. You'll want to follow these peeps' careers if you like games of the "video" persuasion.

- While disappointed that the version presented does not support all the developed features, isn't this one heck of a polished and pretty game? Hard to believe it was done in such a short time.

- Those blue birds in battle armor are too adorable, and I will defend them with my life.

The TEAM:

- GammaFoxTBG (Programmer & Game Designer)

- Soupixel (Art)

- Fer-i (Animation)

- Alejandro PHz (Music)

- AndresB (Sound Design)

- PikachuMariachi (Story & Copy)
